name: Paddle (ZappyPrime)
description:
I made this version of pong in a couple hours. its not the best but i just decided to share it anyway. I doubt anyone plays pong anymore. The best thing i added was POST PROCESSING. Which is in my game called the simulation , if you were curious. the worst thing i made was the pause menu... the Green screen of death i call it.

Controls: 

 S = Paddle down

W = Paddle up

Note: You are the left Paddle

Please considering subscribing to my channel. there will be more content when im done making more games!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuOh4fCML1vp6WFdD2YC5Eg
